sat-test-bundle.detailedDescriptionTemplate:
This comprehensive {bundleName} is designed to provide a complete preparation experience for {exam} tests.

What's included:
- {testPackCount} test packs covering various aspects of {tags}
- A mix of topic tests, module tests, and full-length practice exams
- Comprehensive coverage of all key concepts and question types

This bundle is perfect for students looking for a thorough and structured approach to their {exam} preparation. Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your skills, this bundle provides all the resources you need to succeed.

sat-basic-test-bundle.detailedDescriptionTemplate:
The {bundleName} offers a foundational approach to {exam} preparation.

What's included:
- {testPackCount} essential test packs focusing on {tags}
- Targeted practice for core {exam} concepts
- A selection of topic tests to build fundamental skills

This bundle is ideal for students beginning their {exam} preparation journey or those looking to reinforce their basic skills. It provides a solid foundation for further study and improvement in key {exam} areas.
